    MatchleExtensionApp.getBestGuessesUtility(Corpus corpus, MatchleScorer scorer, char[] correctPositions)
    Utility method that computes and returns the best guess suggestions (both worst-case and average-case) from candidates matching known correct positions.
    static List<NGram>
    MatchleExtensionApp.getCandidateGuesses(Corpus corpus, MatchleScorer scorer, char[] correctPositions)
    Returns candidate guesses from the full corpus, sorted by worst-case score, and filtered to only include words that match the known correct positions.

    Runs the game loop for a maximum of maxRounds.
    long
    MatchleScorer.score(NGram key, NGram guess)
    Computes the score for a given key/guess pair using a parallel stream.
    long
    MatchleScorer.scoreAverageCase(NGram guess)
    Computes the average-case score for a given guess, defined as the sum of the scores over all keys in the corpus.
    long
    MatchleScorer.scoreWorstCase(NGram guess)
    Computes the worst-case score for a given guess, defined as the maximum score over all possible keys in the corpus.
    boolean
    Filter.test(NGram ngram)
    Delegates the test to the internal predicate.
    static void
    MatchleExtensionApp.updateCorrectPositions(NGram key, NGram guess, char[] correctPositions)
    Updates the correctPositions array where the guess matches the key exactly.
